extension.name: S5 Snipcart
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: Integrates with snipcart.com. You will need to signup for a free account on snipcart.com and then enter your API key in the admin area of this module.

field.label: Instructions: You will need to signup for a free account on snipcart.com and then enter your API key in the admin area of this module. Then simply publish the module to any position you desire the cart to show up in. Lastly you'll have to add the snipcart code throughout your site. Go to snipcart.com for more information on how to do this.

field.name: s5_apikey
field.label: API Key
field.description: Enter your API key here after your signup on snipcart.com for an account. Go to your dashboard and you'll be able to retrieve your key from there

field.name: s5_sc_cartpopup
field.label: Enable Cart Popup on Item Add
field.description: Choose whether to enable the cart to popup when an item is added or disable it.

field.name: s5_sc_showprice
field.label: Show Price?
field.description: Choose whether to show the price next to the cart or hide it.

field.name: s5_carticon
field.label: White or Black Cart Icon?
field.description: Choose whether you desire a white or black cart icon.
